articles.title: KCNA on Tricksters' Selfish Sophism about "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
KCNA on Tricksters' Selfish Sophism about "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities tried to save their lost faces even a bit, uttering that they feel disappointment with the presidential statement of the UN Security Council concerning the "Cheonan" case but there was what they called "success" at least.
					 World media, however, consider the presidential statement as a total fiasco for them.
					
					 No wonder, media put it that the south Korean authorities' original plan to wrest "apology and compensation" from the DPRK by prodding the UNSC into adopting a "resolution" of legal binding force went up in smoke, terming the presidential statement an absurd and toothless one.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that media are jeering at the U.S. and south Korea, saying: The fact that the presidential statement took note of the DPRK's stand that it has nothing to do with the case of "Cheonan's" sinking now that the "chief culprit" of the case has not yet been probed means, in the final analysis, that the UNSC does not view the case as "something done by north Korea", and the U.S. and south Korea raised a hue and cry over the case but it ended in the publication of a very ambiguous presidential statement that seems to defend north Korea.
					
					 This is a natural outcome based on the objective reality in which the international community terms the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' "Cheonan" diplomacy a fiasco.
					
					 A scrutiny into the presidential statement proved that the DPRK was right when it asserted that the case is an issue to be settled between the north and the south, not an issue to be referred to the UNSC in view of its nature.
					
					 By nature the UNSC has to perform the function of handling any incident posing "threat to international peace and stability" and finding out its culprit and "punishing" him.
					
					However, the presidential statement not only took a deformed attitude of condemning the recent case itself without singling out the author of it but also called upon the parties concerned to settle the case peacefully through their direct dialogue after considering it as a regional affair.
					
					 This amounted to the UNSC's affirmation of the DPRK’s stand that the "Cheonan" case is not a matter to be dealt with at the UN forum as asserted by the United States and the south Korean authorities, but a matter to be settled by the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 Such being the case, the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are misinterpreting the presidential statement in favor of them, adding something to it as they please in a bid to save their face even a bit. But such behavior will only reveal how poor their position is.
					
					 Every sin brings its punishment with it and one bereft of any reason would talk much.
					
					 Though the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are talking a lot like a thief afraid of his own shadow, they can neither cover up the truth behind the "Cheonan" case nor hide up their despicable true colors.
					
					In keeping with the presidential statement saying that "the Security Council encourages the settlement of outstanding issues on the Korean Peninsula by peaceful means to resume direct dialogue and negotiation through appropriate channels," the DPRK will do its utmost to probe the truth about the case to the last and achieve peace, stability and denuclearization of the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets German Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets German Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Thomas Schafer, outgoing German ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Burundian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Burundian President
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Pierre Nkurunziza upon his reelection as Burundian president.
					 Wishing the president greater success in his work for peace, stability and economic prosperity of the country, Kim in the message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Montenegro President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Montenegro President
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Filip Vujanovic, president of Montenegro, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would favorably develop on the principle of mutual respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefit.

articles.title: Floral Baskets from Cambodian King and Great King
articles.content:
Floral Baskets from Cambodian King and Great King
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, and Norodom Sihanouk, great king of Cambodia, sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The delegation of the Royal Palace of Cambodia led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on July 7 to lay the large floral baskets before the portrait of the President upon the authorization of the king and the great king of Cambodia.
					
					 Kong Sam Ol said that Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, founder and eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, was the people's leader who devoted all his life to the country and the people.
					
					 Noting that the Cambodian people are praying for his immortality, he wished Marshal Kim Jong Il good health and happiness and the Korean people greater success in the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation under his wise leadership.

articles.title: WPD Marked in Korea
articles.content:
WPD Marked in Korea
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Colorful activities have been conducted in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the World Population Day (WPD), July 11, to suit this year's theme "Everyone Counts".
					 A seminar on population census and reproductive health was held at the Grand People's Study House on July 12.
					
					 At the seminar the theme of the 2010 World Population Day was explained, the results of the population census in 2008, the prospect of population and the results of a survey of the pregnant women's mortality made public and achievements and experience gained in the effort for promoting women's reproductive health, one of the Millennium Development Goals (MDG),  introduced. An action program was also discussed.
					
					 Meanwhile, mass media dealt with articles calling for respecting the working people's right to existence and invigorating services for reproductive health.
					
					 The Population Centre published a special issue of the newspaper Population Information.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Always Finds Himself among People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Always Finds Himself among People
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung always found himself among the popular masses in the whole period of his revolutionary activities.
					 He visited many army units, factories, mines, schools, hospitals, restaurants, shops and families across the country from the first day of the building of a new country to the last period of his life.
					
					 He walked even trails to mountain villages, roads to the frontline areas during the war and muddy roads to industrial and agricultural establishments.
					
					 It was his pleasure to find himself among servicepersons and people.
					
					 He visited more than 20,600 units in 8,650 days from the first day of the building of a new country.
					
					 His field guidance tours were some 578,000 kilometers long, equivalent to 301 shuttles between the southern tip and the northern tip of the country and to fourteen and a half rounds of the earth.
					
					 Through the field guidance, he brought about a new history of modern Korea, overcoming manifold difficulties and trials by dint of the people's inexhaustible strength and wisdom.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in Building Prosperous Nation
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in Building Prosperous Nation
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean people, on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise, are looking back on the exploits performed by him for the building of a powerful socialist country with a brilliant example of creation and construction.
					 The President pioneered a new road of an independent national economy from the first period of building a new country after the liberation of the country. In the postwar period, he set forth a policy and tasks for laying foundations of industrialization in the period of a five-year plan and energetically led the effort for its accomplishment.
					
					 On July 29, Juche 42 (1953), two days after the cease-fire, he visited the then Hwanghae Iron Works and said that priority should be given to heavy industry in the rehabilitation of national economy and the open-hearth furnace should be the first target in the reconstruction of the works to produce steel necessary for the rehabilitation of the economy.
					
					 Inspired by his field guidance, the workers of the factory replaced the destroyed 50-ton open-hearth furnace with a 100-ton one in spite of the obstructionists' moves.
					
					 The campaign for the postwar rehabilitation and construction was expanded all over the country under his wise leadership.
					
					 The then Kangson Steel Plant finished the rebuilding of electric furnace No. 2 in 40 days after the cease-fire and turned out the first molten iron while the then Songjin Steel Plant started the steel production less than two months after the cease-fire.
					
					 Huichon, Rakwon, Ryongsong and other major machine plants manufactured lathes, presses, 8-meter turning lathes, large machine tools and vehicles such as motorcar, tractor and bulldozer. The chemical industry base in Hungnam started the fertilizer output.
					
					 The socialist industrialization was carried out in the country in only fourteen years.
					
					 Monumental edifices erected in different parts of the country are also associated with his immortal feats.
					
					 The foundations of the socialist independent national economy have been further consolidated under the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Japan's Reckless Scenario to Stifle Chongryon Flayed
articles.content:
Japan's Reckless Scenario to Stifle Chongryon Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese Supreme Court made its ruling at a hearing on the "litigation instituted by the Resolution and Collection Corporation" that if the premises of the Central Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and its land can be confiscated if they are confirmed to be the properties of Chongryon. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a premeditated scenario of Japan to completely eradicate Chongryon not only financially but also as a base. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the Japanese reactionaries have escalated their moves to stifle Chongryon for several years, the commentary notes: The above-said moves are little short of the criminal acts against the DPRK that have been intensified as part of the sanctions against the DPRK and the moves to stifle it.
					
					The main thrust of Japan's anti-DPRK campaign is the moves to stifle Chongryon internally.
					
					 The danger of Japan's anti-DPRK campaign kicked up externally these days finds a striking manifestation in its attempt to "inspect" DPRK-flagged ships in the open sea. 
					
					 The above-said moves to grab the premises of the Central Headquarters of Chongryon and "inspect" DPRK-flagged ships in the open sea are a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK. This is also an undisguised political and military provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' anti-DPRK campaign is nothing but a dirty and reckless action of the henchmen of the U.S. and political pygmies. 
					
					 Japan is sadly mistaken if it calculates that its shameless and reckless behavior will work on the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to bear deep in mind that a mere reckless action taken by them may trigger off a war.

articles.title: Traitor Lee's Extension of OPCON Censured
articles.content:
Traitor Lee's Extension of OPCON Censured
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea recently begged its American master to postpone "the transfer of wartime operation control (OPCON)" till 2015. This is a sordid act of sycophancy and treachery which can be committed only by a poor pro-U.S. stooge who stakes his life on the U.S. and a revelation of an unpardonable traitorous scenario to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost with the backing of outside forces. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said action is a product of the despicable collusion and tie-up between the master and his servant as it brought to light their scenario to provoke the war.
					
					 The U.S. extension of the OPCON under the pretext of the warship case made it possible for it to strengthen its military domination over south Korea and put its conservative ruling forces under a tighter control in a bid to effectively use them as a shock brigade for implementing its policy for invading the DPRK. Meanwhile, the conservative group solicited from its master positive political and military "support" for its moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK and it got greater courage to perpetrate reckless military provocations against compatriots.
					
					 It is needless to say that the above-said action will entail such serious adverse consequences as stoking the confrontation between the north and the south, escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and increasing the danger of a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is, indeed, an unpardonable gang of traitors as it is making desperate efforts to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK, selling off even the dignity and interests of the nation to outside forces.
					
					 The Koreans are keenly aware of the inside story about the south Korean conservative group's criminal extension of the OPCON and will force the group to stand a trial of history for selling off the country and the nation.

articles.title: June 15 Cause Sure to Triumph
articles.content:
June 15 Cause Sure to Triumph
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Neither challenges nor obstructions on the part of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad can block the grand march of the Korean nation towards national reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It is the law of the development of history for the just cause of the popular masses to triumph, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The June 15 cause has tremendous vitality as it is based on the idea of "By our nation itself", the national spirit in the new century, and it is sure to win as it is the cause for the Koreans themselves who are vitally interested in national reunification.
					
					 The June 15 cause is, in essence, a struggle to promote the reconciliation, unity and cooperation between the north and the south in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and represents the mental power of "By our nation itself" and, at the same time, the vitality of the above-said cause.
					
					 The only way out for the Korean nation is to achieve reunification. Let us pave the way for the nation and national reunification with do-or-die determination and will. This is the unanimous will of the Koreans living in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 Over the past decade of the June 15 era of reunification the Koreans fully demonstrated the truth and the vitality of the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The final victory of the June 15 cause is sure to be accomplished only when the Koreans at home and abroad unite as firm as a rock under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and wage a nationwide dynamic struggle to smash the moves of the anti-reunification forces to escalate the confrontation and start a war.

articles.title: AINDF Denounces US Moves for Another Korean War
articles.content:
AINDF Denounces US Moves for Another Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Information Department of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on July 7 released an indictment denouncing the U.S. for working hard to conceal its true colors as the provocateur of the June 25 war and ignite another war of aggression against the DPRK, according to Internet site Kuguk Jonson.
					 The indictment cited facts to prove that the U.S. provoked the June 25 war and brought unbearable misfortune and calamities to the Koreans by employing the most cruel means and methods in the world history of wars.
					
					 The U.S. has invariably pursued the policy toward the Korean Peninsula to militarily occupy the northern half of Korea while keeping hold on south Korea as its military base for aggression, far from quitting this land after drawing a due lesson from the disgraceful defeat it suffered in the June 25 war, the indictment said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. brought together in Washington representatives of its satellite states which dispatched their mercenaries to the Korean war on July 27, 1953 when the Armistice Agreement was signed, forcing them to conclude a "declaration of 16 states" in which they promised to hurl troops and military hardware into the operation for invading the DPRK to be conducted again.
					
					 It came out with a "renewed policy" for the purpose of recovering from its defeat in the war and newly attempting an aggression against the DPRK at the National Security Council held in the middle of December in 1953 and put it into a concrete shape to produce the notorious strategy which calls for directing the spearhead of aggression bigger than the preceding one with massive retaliatory force based on the nuclear superiority before the strength of the Asian countries including the DPRK grows stronger.
					
					 According to this brigandish war doctrine, the U.S. turned south Korea into a logistic base for waging a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. has steadily amended, supplemented and completed the above-said provocative war scenario and staged saber-rattling almost every day, rendering the situation tense and increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 It has made desperate efforts to dampen the desire for the reunification by a conspiratorial method whenever this desire grew stronger on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 When the historic Pyongyang meeting took place and the June 15 joint declaration was published in 2000, the U.S. worked hard to turn the June 15 era of independent reunification into that of confrontation and push it to the phase of a war.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak, a heinous pro-U.S. and sycophantic traitor, "won" the 2007 "presidential election". This was a product of the persistent and mean plots of the U.S. to put an end to the June 15 era.
					
					 By recently faking up the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking the U.S. drove the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 Under the pretext of the warship case the U.S. overturned an agreement on the "transfer of wartime operation control (OPCON)" in 2012 on which it made, pressurized by the south Koreans' fierce struggle for independence against the U.S. and thus revealed its wicked intention to permanently hold the right to command the "ROK army."
					
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula reminds one of that six decades ago when the U.S. provoked the war of aggression against the DPRK by instigating traitor Syngman Rhee and massively hurled troops of its allies into the war under the name of the UN. 
					
					 The Korean nation can neither live in peace even a moment nor escape nuclear disaster as long as the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are present in south Korea, the indictment said, and continued:
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK again, the people in south Korea will turn out as one in a sacred just and patriotic struggle to build a reunified country alongside the brothers and sisters in the north out to defend the country in order to protect the honor of the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Educational Policy under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Educational Policy under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Society of Parents of Students for Equal Education and the Action for the Rights of School Youth and Children of south Korea issued declarations in protest against the unjust educational policy of the south Korean puppet authorities.
					 The organizations in their declarations accused the puppet authorities of contemplating conducting an opinion poll on enforcing the "system for assessing the ability development of teachers" among the parents of students and the students.
					
					 It is nonsensical to improve the professional ability of the teachers through the above-said system without fundamentally solving the educational issue, the organizations held, declaring that they would not participate in the opinion poll.
					
					 The above-said action of the authorities is aimed at dismissing the teachers who incur their displeasure by abusing their power, they charged.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Romania, South Africa and India between July 3 and 5 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President 
					Kim Il Sung.
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, said that Kim Il Sung was the great statesman and father of the people who regarded the people as Heaven.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Thanks to the President the state and the army in the DPRK were named with the word "people" and the most splendid and important edifices were also called after this word.
					
					 Though he passed away, he is always alive in the hearts of mankind for the undying feats he performed on behalf of the era and the revolution.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said that the President set forth the line of independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence on the basis of the people-centered Juche idea and built a strong socialist bulwark, thus clearly showing the road to be followed by the world progressives.
					
					 J. K. Patel, director of the Indian Institute for Foreign Policy Studies, said that the President is the genius of creation and construction and the tender-hearted father of the people who built the DPRK into a powerful socialist state.
					
					 In the meantime, the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Malian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement arranged seminars on feats of the President on July 5 and 7 on the same occasion.

articles.title: DPRK Books Donated to Bulgarian Library
articles.content:
DPRK Books Donated to Bulgarian Library
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of donating DPRK books took place in Bulgaria on July 3.
					 Present there were the curator and staff members of a library in Sofia and the DPRK ambassador to Bulgaria and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 At the ceremony, Vols. 5 and 6 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of President Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences "With the Century" and Vols. 7 and 8 of its Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution (continuing edition) and "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" and his other works and CDs introducing the DPRK were handed to the curator.

articles.title: ATCC comenta el fracaso de los conspiradores
articles.content:
ATCC comenta el fracaso de los conspiradores
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- En estos dias, Estados Unidos y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas tratan de mejorar su imagen deshonrada diciendo que aunque les resulto decepcionante la declaracion del presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en cuanto al incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", hubo en ella cierto "exito" pequeno.
					 En contraste, la prensa internacional evalua ese documento como fracaso total de ellos.
					
					  Los medios de prensa especifican que dicha declaracion fue tan superficial y vacia que no tuvo ningun sentido, anadiendo que de esta manera, "resulto un fracaso total el plan" de las autoridades surcoreanas de reclamar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la "disculpa y la recompensa" al aprobar una "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que tenga la vigencia legal.
					
					 En particular, en cuanto a este parrafo de la declaracion del presidente del Consejo de Seguridad: "puesto que no se ha buscado al ´culpable´ de hundimiento del ´Cheonan´, se toma en consideracion la posicion de Corea de no tener nada que ver con este incidente", dicen que esto significa que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no considera al Norte de Corea como "culpable" y agregan en tono ironico que si bien EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea armaron un gran escandalo, el incidente "bajo su telon con la declaracion del presidente tan ambigua que parece estar cobijando al Norte de Corea".
					
					  Fue inevitable que la sociedad internacional definiera, en base a los hechos objetivos, como fracaso la "diplomacia en torno al buque ´Cheonan´" de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					  La declaracion del presidente mostro que fue correcta la opinion de la RPDC de que en vista del contenido del incidente, este no debio ser tratado en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU sino ha de ser resuelto entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					  Este organismo de la ONU tiene la facultad de "castigar" al culpable de los incidentes que "amenacen la paz y la estabilidad internacionales".
					
					 Sin embargo, la declaracion de su presidente aprobada esta vez no pudo apuntar al culpable asumiendo una actitud mediocre de denunciar solo el incidente. Ademas, definio el caso como problema regional y llamo a las partes involucradas a resolverlo por via pacifica mediante las conversaciones directas.
					
					  Esto significa afirmar la posicion de la RPDC de que el caso del "Cheonan" no es un problema a tratarse en la ONU, como insisten EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas, sino un asunto que deben manejar ambas partes coreanas.
					
					  A pesar de esta realidad, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas tergiversan a su conveniencia la declaracion del presidente con el fin de recuperar su honra perdida. Este hecho muestra que ellos se hallan en una situacion muy pobre y vulnerable.
					
					  Los culpables terminan pagando sus crimenes y los irrazonables recurren siempre a la chismeria.
					
					 Aunque EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas hacen comentarios de todo tipo sobre el criminal incidente del "Cheonan", no podran encubrir la verdad ni ocultar su fachada deshonesta.
					
					 Ateniendose al parrafo de la declaracion del presidente del Consejo de Seguridad: "se promueve resolver de manera pacifica los problemas pendientes de la Peninsula Coreana reiniciando el dialogo directo y las negociaciones por vias adecuadas", la RPDC se esforzara en todo lo posible por esclarecer hasta el final la verdad del incidente y alcanzar la paz, la estabilidad y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Actividades por el "Dia Mundial de la Poblacion"
articles.content:
Actividades por el "Dia Mundial de la Poblacion"
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- En ocasion del "Dia Mundial de la Poblacion" (11 de julio), se realizaron en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diversas actividades segun el tema de este ano "Abarquemos a todas las personas".
					 En el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo tuvo lugar el dia 12 el "seminario sobre el censo de la poblacion y la salud reproductiva".
					
					  En la ocasion se hizo el bosquejo del tema de dicha efemeride de 2010 y fueron publicados unos datos incluyendo el resultado del censo de la poblacion efectuado en 2008, la poblacion perspectiva y el informe de investigacion sobre las causas de muerte de las embarazadas y parturientas que es una de las metas importantes del desarrollo de nuevo milenio.
					
					Igualmente, se dieron a conocer los exitos y las experiencias logrados en el censo de la poblacion y las labores para mejorar la salud reproductiva de las mujeres y quedo discutida la direccion de las actividades futuras.
					
					  Por otra parte, con el mismo motivo, los organos de prensa e informacion publicaron los articulos que tratan los problemas para respetar el derecho de vida de los trabajadores y dinamizar el servicio para la salud reproductiva de las mujeres.
					
					  En el Instituto de Poblacion fue impresa la edicion especial de las "Noticias de Poblacion".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica intento de Japon de desarticular Chongryon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica intento de Japon de desarticular Chongryon
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- Hace poco, la Corte Suprema de Japon dicto el fallo de que sera posible confiscar el edificio y el predio de la sede del Comite Central de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) si ellos son comprobados como propiedades de esta organizacion en el "proceso solicitado por la Corporacion de Resolucion y Coleccion".
					 Esto es un intento premeditado de Japon de desarticular la Chongryon no solo en lo financiero sino eliminando tambien fisicamente su base.
					
					 Asi revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					 Las maniobras de ese pais isleno tendentes a aplastar a la Chongryon se recrudecieron desde hace unos anos, siendo el acto criminal que forma parte de la campana para sancionar y atropellar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  La campana anti-RPDC de Japon se manifiesta principalmente en el ambito nacional en las maniobras para aplastar la Chongryon y en el plano externo se muestra evidentemente en las pretensiones de "registrar" los buques coreanos en alta mar.
					
					  Este hecho constituye la violacion flagrante de la soberania de la RPDC y la abierta provocacion politico-militar contra esta.
					
					  La campana anti-RPDC de los reaccionarios japoneses no pasa de ser la locura de los enanos politicos (reaccionarios japoneses), lacayos de EE.UU.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses deben tener presente que sus imprudentes y equivocadas maniobras anti-RPDC no podran salir con la suya sino pueden servir de detonante de la guerra.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun vuelve a condenar dilacion de traspaso del "mando"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun vuelve a condenar dilacion de traspaso del "mando"
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ATCC) -- El traidor Lee Myung Bak suplico a su amo gringo que pospusiera hasta el ano 2015 el traspaso del "mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra".
					Al cometer esa accion vendepatria y servil a grandes potencias, ese miserable lacayo proyanqui mostro su imperdonable intento antinacional de desatar a toda costa la guerra contra la RPDC con el apoyo de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					En un articulo individual publicado este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun sostuvo que la dilacion de la "transferencia del mando" es el fruto de la confabulacion entre el amo y su lacayo para desatar la guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					En virtud del acuerdo alcanzado en tal sentido bajo el pretexto del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", el imperio puede fortalecer el dominio militar sobre el Sur de Corea y usar facilmente a las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas en el poder como brigada de choque en el cumplimiento de la agresiva politica norteamericana a la RPDC, senala el articulo y prosigue:
					
					Por su parte, las segundas consiguieron el activo "apoyo" politico-militar de su amo a su campana conflictiva y belicista contra la RPDC y pueden dar mas calor a sus provocaciones militares contra los connacionales.
					
					No cabe duda de que la transferencia de ese "mando" tendra graves consecuencias como agravar el enfrentamiento entre el Norte y el Sur y la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y aumentar el peligro de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak, que intenta desatar la guerra contra la RPDC vendiendo a las fuerzas extranjeras la dignidad e intereses de la nacion, es la imperdonable horda de vendepatrias.
					
					Todos los compatriotas ven claramente el intento criminal con que la camarilla surcoreana pospuso el "traslado del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra" y someteran sin falta al tribunal de la historia a los traidores al pais y la nacion.
